item.title: About
item.description: Hey there # My name is Antriana Christofi, and I’m a passionate and ambitious student currently pursuing my studies at HAN University in the charming city of Nijmegen. Originally hailing from the picturesque island of Cyprus, I’ve brought my love for culture and diversity with me as I embrace every opportunity in this new chapter of my life. Languages are my playground, and I’ve ventured beyond borders with fluency in Greek, English, Russian, French, and Italian.

item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: "Hello, friend?" That's lame. Maybe I should give you a name?
